name: Slime Menace
description:
Slime Menace

The dungeon of slimes is crawling with evils, facing this barbarism is a you, a cute pink slime who has to survive the hordes of red slimes. You are not alone though, you have a laser pulse at your arsenal, and.....a friend, a cute blue slime doll, he cant do much except distract your enemy, but hey, at least he is trying. Explore the dungeons to unravel the dark secrets hidden in it in this latest action adventure pixel experience.

This game is in very early development and was prepared for the Elan and Envision Game Jam.
